infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show your current position and help you book rides.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to show your current position and help you book rides.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs background location access for driver tracking and navigation during rides.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may use microphone for voice commands during navigation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app may use camera for profile pictures and ride verification.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access photo library for profile pictures.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RideApp to use your location to show nearby drivers and help you book rides.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow RideApp to use your location even when the app is not open for driver tracking and navigation.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow RideApp to use your location while using the app for ride booking and navigation.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you set a profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take profile pictures.
